title: Fountains
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
description: Horizontal rectangle. The scheme of the pavilion is similar to that of -2130. The architraves are higher. No niches. Framing lines.
name: Drawing
